com.communote.server.api.core.security

Interface SecurityCodeManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityCodeManagementBase, SecurityCodeManagementImpl

    public interface SecurityCodeManagement
    Management class for security codes.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAllCodesByUser(Long userId, Class<? extends SecurityCode> clazz)
      Delete all codes of the given user.
      SecurityCode findByCode(String code)
      Find the security code by the code value.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteAllCodesByUser

        void deleteAllCodesByUser(Long userId,
                          Class<? extends SecurityCode> clazz)
        Delete all codes of the given user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user.
        clazz - The type of security code.

      • findByCode

        SecurityCode findByCode(String code)
        Find the security code by the code value.
        Parameters:
        code - The code value
        Returns:
        The code as object or null, if there is none.

      • findByCode

        <T> T findByCode(String code,
                 Converter<SecurityCode,T> converter)
        Find the security code by the code value and convert it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the conversion result
        Parameters:
        code - The code value
        converter - the converter to create the result object from the found code
        Returns:
        The converted code or null, if there is none.

      • removeCode

        void removeCode(Long id)
        Remove the given code.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the code to remove.
